metadata.title: CVE-2014-5118 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Trusted Boot (tboot) before 1.8.2 has a 'loader.c' Security BypassVulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5118` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tboot - 1.8.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tboot package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-0ubuntu1').
